metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3592 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Mosquitto before 2.0.16, a memory leak occurs when clients send v5 CONNECT packets with a will message that contains invalid property types.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3592` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmosquitto1 - 1.6.9-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
libmosquittopp1 - 1.6.9-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
mosquitto - 1.6.9-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
mosquitto-clients - 1.6.9-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.9-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
